author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
Okay, I don’t know what I was expecting from a gaslamp fantasy horror novella pitched as Supernatural meets The Witcher meets Bloodborne, but Jessica A. McMinn truly surprised me in all the best ways with Parasitic Omens. It’s unapologetically dark, gruesome and gory, and it packs a way bigger punch than its deceptively short page […]

The post REVIEW: Parasitic Omens by Jessica A. McMinn appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Parasitic Omens by Jessica A. McMinn
